metadata.title: Create Your Blog with SvelteKit
metadata.excerpt: It's time to rewrite your blog in SvelteKit!

content:
Recently, SvelteKit is released in public beta. It's always better to learn with project and for a Server Side Rendering (SSR) oriented framework, creating a blog is
